name: Prison Escape (Text Adventure Game)
description:
This is one of the first complete games I have completed in a course that I'm taking on Udemy.   I was told to upload it and share it with the world, so here you go.

Story:

You find yourself in a Prison Cell after you are charged for a crime you say you didn't commit. You can  either rot in your cell, or you can find a way out of here so you can prove your innocence.  The choice is up to you!
